income.gift_two: to make your loved ones happy

about.title: “Kaprizo is...
about.text: A mobile marketplace with gift vouchers. You choose a gift remotely, and we deliver it.

wide_selection.title: Wide Selection
wide_selection.text: Popular stores and service centers in one app

fast_and_easy.title: Fast & Easy Purchase
fast_and_easy.text: Choose a gift in just a moment

remote_control.title: Remote control
remote_control.text: Choose a gift from anywhere in the world

for_any_event.title: For any event and celebration
for_any_event.text: Gifts for all holidays are available

saving_money.title: Savings
saving_money.text: Get products and services without commission for the price of the voucher"

additional_services.title: Additional services
additional_services.text: Sending flowers and sweets with vouchers is now possible

one.question: How can I purchase a voucher?
one.answer: Open the app, select a voucher, register, and complete your purchase with secure payment

two.question: Where is the voucher delivered?
two.answer: It will be delivered to the address you specified during purchase, either to yourself or to a person of your choice.

three.question: Is the payment secure?
three.answer: Yes, all payments are encrypted and processed through a secure system

four.question: Can I buy a voucher without registration??
four.answer: No, a quick registration is required to complete the purchase

five.question: What is the voucher’s validity period?
five.answer: The validity period depends on the voucher — details are provided on the voucher itself.

six.question: What are the conditions for using a voucher?
six.answer: 1. The person presenting the voucher in the store can exchange it for products and services.
six.answer2: 2. The voucher can be used until the specified period, after which you can contact the System Operator and get a refund under the conditions specified in the Offer.
six.answer3: 3. The amount indicated on the voucher must be used in full, if your purchase exceeds it, you will pay extra.
six.answer4: 4. If you wish to return the voucher, please contact the Operator. The commission specified in the offer will be deducted from the voucher price.

download_app.title: Ilovani App Store va Google Playdan yuklang
download_app.text: IOS va Android qurilmalari uchun mavjud

payment.title: Make the payment
payment.text: Confirm the purchase and make the payment for the voucher through a secure payment system

register_app.title: Register in the app
register_app.text: Enter your personal information and, by registering, fully utilize the app's features

select_app.title: Choose a voucher
select_app.text: Browse through our store selection and pick the perfect voucher for yourself or a loved one

delivered_voucher.title: Receive the voucher
delivered_voucher.text: Your selected voucher will be instantly delivered to the provided address

footer.description: We will find answers to all your "kapriz"
